#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	string s1="aa",s2="ab",s3="ba",s4="bb",x,s;
	int t,n,i,a[5],mini;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{	
		cin>>n;
		for(i=1;i<=4;i++)
			a[i] = 0;
		s = "";
		while(n--)
		{
			cin>>x;
			if(x==s1)
				a[1]++;
			else if(x==s2)
				a[2]++;
			else if(x==s3)
				a[3]++;
			else
				a[4]++;
		}
		mini = min(a[2],a[3]);
		if(a[1]%2==0&&a[4]%2==0)
		{
			for(i=1;i<=a[1]/2;i++)
				s = s + s1;
			for(i=1;i<=mini;i++)
				s = s + s2;
			for(i=1;i<=a[4];i++)
				s = s + s4;
			for(i=1;i<=mini;i++)
				s = s + s3;
			for(i=1;i<=a[1]/2;i++)
				s = s + s1;
			cout<<s<<endl;
		}
		else if(a[1]%2!=0&&a[4]%2==0)
		{
			for(i=1;i<=a[1]/2;i++)
				s = s + s1;
			for(i=1;i<=mini;i++)
				s = s + s2;
			for(i=1;i<=a[4]/2;i++)
				s = s + s4;
			s = s + s1;
			for(i=1;i<=a[4]/2;i++)
				s = s + s4;
			for(i=1;i<=mini;i++)
				s = s + s3;
			for(i=1;i<=a[1]/2;i++)
				s = s + s1;
			cout<<s<<endl;
		}
		else if(a[1]%2==0&&a[4]%2!=0)
		{
			for(i=1;i<=a[1]/2;i++)
				s = s + s1;
			for(i=1;i<=mini;i++)
				s = s + s2;
			for(i=1;i<=a[4];i++)
				s = s + s4;
			for(i=1;i<=mini;i++)
				s = s + s3;
			for(i=1;i<=a[1]/2;i++)
				s = s + s1;
			cout<<s<<endl;
		}
		else 
		{
			for(i=1;i<=a[1]/2;i++)
				s = s + s1;
			for(i=1;i<=mini;i++)
				s = s + s2;
			for(i=1;i<=a[4]/2;i++)
				s = s + s4;
			s = s + s1;
			for(i=1;i<=a[4]/2;i++)
				s = s + s4;
			for(i=1;i<=mini;i++)
				s = s + s3;
			for(i=1;i<=a[1]/2;i++)
				s = s + s1;
			cout<<s<<endl;
		}	
	}
	return 0;
}
